head.title: Tommy Hilfiger Expands Store at The Westchester

hedline.hl1: Tommy Hilfiger Expands Store at The Westchester

abstract.p: Tommy Hilfiger store at The Westchester mall reopens after nearly doubling its size (S)

block.p: The Tommy Hilfiger store at The Westchester has reopened after nearly doubling in size.

The store, one of the mall's original tenants, absorbed the adjoining space vacated by the previous tenant, Barami Studio, to reach its present size of 7,700 square feet. The renovation work took almost two months. The store now carries men's, women's, infants' and toddlers' sportswear, as well as licensed products like jewelry and handbags.
The Tommy Hilfiger store at The Westchester has reopened after nearly doubling in size.

The store, one of the mall's original tenants, absorbed the adjoining space vacated by the previous tenant, Barami Studio, to reach its present size of 7,700 square feet. The renovation work took almost two months. The store now carries men's, women's, infants' and toddlers' sportswear, as well as licensed products like jewelry and handbags.
''It's one of our very successful stores, and we wanted to add space,'' a company spokesman said.
